net.datacrow.core.clients

Interface IFileImportClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IClient
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ISynchronizerClient

    public interface IFileImportClient
extends IClient
    This client can be updated on events and results form a file import process. Additionally it will ask for additional information from this client.
    Author:
    Robert Jan van der Waals
    See Also:
    FileImporter
